title: Aaron Carter Accuses His Brother Nick Of Sexually Assaulting A 91-Year-Old Woman, Calls On FBI To Help
text:
Related:

Aaron Carter Says He Was Sexually Abused by Late Sister & Accuses Nick of Family Abuse

Nick Carter Says Brother Aaron Hears 'Voices In His Head'

Nick Carter Serves Brother Aaron With Restraining Order After Violent Threats

Aaron Carter Appears Thin & Sickly After Cancelling Tour Dates

Aaron Carter Gets Restraining Order Against Ex-Girlfriend, Claims She Threatened to Stab Him

Carter Family Drama .

Former pop star Aaron Carter has been vocal on social media about some Carter family drama, accusing his older sister Leslie and brother Nick of sexual assault. Nick, of Backstreet Boys fame, responded by filing a restraining order against his brother.

Aaron Is Having A Social Media Meltdown

Aaron has continued to have a meltdown on social media, accusing Nick of raping an elderly woman in a now deleted Instagram post.

"Hey [FBI] my brother raped Mildred and told me in confidence in his pick up truck she was 91 years old and my brother told me he covered her mouth so no one could hear her scream. Put me on a polygraph machine please [FBI] my mother knows she was taking care of two elderly women who were on hospice Mildred and opal who my mother was keeping alive. [FBI] what are you gonna do about that!? NOTHING! ? I’m REPORTING A RAPE FROM NICK ON SN ELDERLY WOMEN WHO WAS DYING AND WAS 91 that he raped. Strap nick up to a polygraph machine and a really good one please."

Nick Is Increasing Security
